text:
[Verse]
Cruisin' through the city
Neon lights so pretty
Windows down we feelin' free
Just you and me

[Verse 2]
Streetlights flashing by
Stars up in the sky
Radio up playin' loud
Lost in the crowd

[Chorus]
Midnight drive so fast
Wishing this would last
Time just flyin' past
We're free at last

[Verse 3]
Wheels on the pavement
No need for statements
Just the hum of the road
Feelin' that code

[Chorus]
Midnight drive so fast
Wishing this would last
Time just flyin' past
We're free at last

[Bridge]
No destination clear
Just glad that you're here
Midnight's our friend tonight
Everything's right
title: Midnight Drive
